website_summaries.verdict: Surprising amount of power and torque make this an ideal choice for both youth and adult riders. Low-pressure tires  improve the ride.
pros: 200-pound weight limit, but enough engine power for heavier riders
cons: Front and rear racks not included
Shipping damage is a common issue

customer_reviews.title: No German engineers designed this bike
customer_reviews.text: Seemed durable enough when we first started it. But after about 30 minutes of riding it on soft, dry grass, the chain kept falling off. Followed instructions to tighten, but it kept falling off. Tried to loosen the engine mount bolt to slide the motor back (per manual) but one of the bolts was so tight that it stripped. Every other bolt is placed in such a way that it’s almost impossible to loosen cuz there’s always metal in the way. I doubt any German engineers designed this bike. Gonna return it. Bike became un-rideable within 30 minutes with just a small 6 yr old riding it. Unacceptable. I’ll pay a bit more and buy a Honda next time
customer_reviews.author: porcelainpunisher

customer_reviews.title: The CT200u is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have the CT200U-A (black). It's very easy to put together, took about 30 minutes. Box had little to no damage. Only had a few scratches on the frame. Everything else was perfect. The Governor screw is welded on. After cutting that off, it's so fast. I can't even describe how much fun I'm having on it. The BEST thing about this little bike is that it starts on the first pull every single time! It's also very quiet when it's just sitting there and running, not moving. Very fast, very powerful little engine. Best money I've ever spent. Can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: J-C

customer_reviews.title: fun fun fun! buy one as this is my first one at 43 years old and wow i love it!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great minibike and my first one ever to ride in my life! this thing is nothing but fun and enjoyment and well worth $500 bucks! plus I defeted the throttle limit screw by Dremeling the tack weld on the bottom of the screw and took ot out and now instead of 20mph I get 25+ and I can understand why they cut it back on the speed as it was intended for younger people but once a full adult gets on I say open her up a bit. I love this minibike and highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: inline6ford

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE**** It hasn't even been a full 3 months since we've owned it and it's already broke. My husband said something is cracked and not going to be able to fix. Also have tried calling support with no suck luck. I needed an extra person to help me assemble since (to me) the bike is heavy and I struggled to put the handle bars on and couldn't put the wheel on at all without help. My son loves riding it tho so that makes me happy. The paint job isn't the best. Arrived chipped in several spots but whatever since it will get banged up I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Hathaki

customer_reviews.title: It's more fun than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put around camping. I was a little concerned about the weight limit as everyone who'll be riding it is an adult and a couple are well over 200lbs. But this thing did not falter! It's more fun than I anticipated. With the fat tires it'll go over pretty much anything in our way. Zero regret! If you're even considering a mini bike this one will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Problems From Day ONE
customer_reviews.text: It didn't last a year. Out of the box the chain was too large and I had to pay to have it shortened, then after that it began malfunctioning... it wouldn't start. Everyone in the neighborhood had a turn at trying to fix this thing. NOPE! Finally, I paid somebody who replaced the carburetor and it worked for about a week. Then the timing was off. Now, it's dead in our shed. Honestly, everyone who worked on it was mechanically talented... don't bother with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bike so that I could ride along with my granddaughter. I had given her a mini-bike of another brand that was designed for a smaller person. This one carries me fine, and I'm 6 feet tall and 200 pounds. The only complaint I had was when UPS delivered it the box looked like it had been through a grinder! I had the driver wait until I inspected the bike and the only damage was a scratch on the handlebars.
customer_reviews.author: crudfoot

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was perfect, for as big of a product, the drivers were quiet and respectful because it was early. The bike was packaged neatly and protected. It was easy to assemble. And it started up immediately. Our son is 14 and has no problem driving it.
customer_reviews.author: LBS

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: At first was happy my grand daughter used around the house at Christmas time for about 10 hours,, she came back at spring break and it will not run has lost all compression, and of course it only has a 90 say warranty. I might just ship it back to amazon. As it was suppose to be a Christmas gift that would last more than four days for 600.00 dollars
customer_reviews.author: wayne blocker

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best thing I could ever have purchased for my grandson. It is durable, well-build and really easy to assemble. No missing or wrong parts and I highly recommend this product! So far, it has given my grandson many hours of fun and entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Died after a few months
customer_reviews.text: CT 100, I bought this for my daughter for Christmas December 2018, and by June 2019 the motor would not start and had no compression. The bike looks good but the motor is junk. Also there is no way to tighten the chain without loosening and sliding the motor. Poor design and very poor engine.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, Save Your Money !!
customer_reviews.text: I won’t bother to post any pictures because it’s not worth it . Save your money , this bike is trash seems like all they cared about was there end “Money” .. I received mine the other day .. what can I say it’s smaller then My mega Moto 80 cc witch by the way is way better. My Colman 100 cc came all beat up & on top of that it’s just over all to small what we’re they thinking? I can’t even fit on my seat .. DO NOT BUY Please save your money or Go with a mega moto 80 cc you will thank me later!!
customer_reviews.author: A True Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice bike for the money little smaller than my wife's ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice bike for the money little smaller than my wife's doodle bug ,when she saw it and sat on it she declared that she would take the coleman and I could have the D-bug, good bike I like the disc brake nice touch good value
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: A perfect sized addition for every household with the room to ride and the will to have fun at a reasonable price.The frame is well made with good welds and paint. It comes with large (20") off road tread tires and fenders adequate to keep the water and mud off. The motor is powerful enough to haul a decent sized adult up an embankment or along a dirt trail briskly . My only real complaint was about the handlebar mounted on/off ignition switch. The mounting bracket bolt hole was stripped out and a different switch had to be fabricated.
customer_reviews.author: garry varga

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to repair
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 11yo he has a ball on it but its cheap. Have had the chain pop off several times. The throttle grip has came loose and had to be reattached. Most recently the throttle cable snapped. The bike is not even 4mts old and its winter in michigan so he hasent been able to ride very much at all.
customer_reviews.author: lentzjj

customer_reviews.title: Great, great buy. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for my kids. Purchased this as a gift for my son and he loves it. My oldest son already had one so of course the second one needed one too. My husband can ride this mini bike with no issues what so ever (and he is a big man) the only difference in this one and the one purchased previously is that It does not have the "cargo accessories" which is fine and doesn't take away from the bike at all. We have not had any issues with anything to date. It's a lot of fun and keeps the kids outside and off electronics. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Luna

customer_reviews.title: Scooter Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit heavier than the recommended weight... But it still goes pretty fast! Even up hill! It suits the purpose it was intended for!
customer_reviews.author: Brent J Boardman

customer_reviews.title: Love it, fast, recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike, 20mph max speed (i’m 180lbs). 20mph was fast for me it accelerates from 0-20 in like 2 seconds that’s what it feels like. Took me about 10 minutes to assemble it it was so easy. I recommend getting the bike it’s fast. Everyone says there was missing parts when they got theirs but mine didn’t come with any. You just have to install the front wheel, fork and the rest of the bike is already put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, well made (cheaply)but really fun
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice little bike I weight 230 pounds ride around on the back tire, did need to tighten chain after riding for 2 day but that's to be expected. Kinda expensive for a pressure washer engine some metal tube and a 420 go kart chain. But overall Really not a bad little bike, I have the ct200u-a. I have fun on. I'd say it does about 20mph but could be increased pretty easily with different clutch size and gear ratios
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Check box the day it arrives
customer_reviews.text: Well got a coleman mini bike for my son it comes in 2 peices. Well the front plate came more mangled then ever. Scratches all the way down to the damn frame on multiple spots its horrible the bike looks like it has been used from plate.smashed frame and handle bars scratched to living hell. And i just got it out of the box. JOKE
customer_reviews.author: Dana hatch

customer_reviews.title: Replace the exhaust to keep from getting burned
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike for our 9 year old However the exhaust muffler gets extremely hot and 3 kids burned their legs on it. We removed the exhaust and ordered a new straight pipe and covered it with insulation wrap
customer_reviews.author: Nina Anselmi Lukenich

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about shipping from reading reviews, however mine showed up with box looking perfect all bolts inside..easy assembly and very fast for being a 200cc..I was so impressed I ordered another one it will arrive tomorrow and hopefully in great shape like the first.
customer_reviews.author: Electrical Engineer Tech

customer_reviews.title: Great item that arrives in lousy packaging
customer_reviews.text: The minibike is awesome. Requires some assembly but nothing too challenging. The box/crate it comes in was damaged and barely staying closed. There were loose parts inside that were at risk of falling out but internal plastic wrapping caught them. So be sure to inventory the parts right away and check all the packing materials for any missing nuts and washers. Otherwise, assembly is easy. Then add oil and gas, and it starts up pretty easy. There is a concern that it appears the drive chain is already near the end of its adjustment, so it will probably need a chain link removed pretty soon as the chain stretches with use. Ride safe!
customer_reviews.author: Randj

customer_reviews.title: Chain may need to be adjusted initially
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike. My son bought with his own money and loves it. Easy to assemble. During the first two days of use the chain kept slipping off but after some minor adjustment and moving the ending up the chain is staying on. Comes with no oil so you have to add your own and add gas and you’re set to ride. He probably gets about 4-5 hours of use out of it per tank. It goes probably about 20 mph
customer_reviews.author: John stults

customer_reviews.title: Came with broke chain. No master link. Scratched and dented.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my son. It came with a broke chain and scratched and dented in several places. I called the manufacturer and the said Amazon is not a official dealer so they will not replace it. I asked where it was assembled and she said China. Very poor shape. I never would sell something to another human being like this. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and super fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Assembly took less than an hour going slow and I rode it all day after assembling it in the morning. I live on quite a bit of land and took some big hills with thick grass that are normally hay fields. I'm 185 lbs and it hauled me quite easily and climbed the big hills with no problems at all! I think I put around 10 miles on it today, both on and off-road. Can't recommend this thing enough, catch it when the price dips down to the $400's.
customer_reviews.author: American Celt

customer_reviews.title: Well-Built Beast of a Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged very well, easy to get up and running, is easy to disassemble to fit in a car trunk for camping/travel, the racks DID NOT come with it (sadly, had to wait to receive those, backordered awhile, but great price from Coleman versus the Chinese aftermarket ones...) NO problems after months of use. Great torque, and firewood hauler. I even pull-started a few motorcycles by towing with rope. Low maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Rowena

customer_reviews.title: Good minibike, crappy shipping
customer_reviews.text: The mini bike arrived on a demolished cardboard pallet with the rear tire resting on the ground, out of the torn box, but surprisingly with no damage to the minibike itself. It took over a month to arrive. I would gladly have paid extra for a better shipping company(on top of the mini bike being overpriced on amazon) bike is well enough made. Only took one ride before installing a torque converter, which made it go from 25mph to 41mph on gps. Tc also made the drivetrain much quieter and the bike much more powerful
customer_reviews.author: J Parker

customer_reviews.title: They should really fix a few basic things.
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately, the bike is great and my son loves it! However, they seem to set you up to fail when you first get it. Why tell me that I may have to move the engine forward if the chain is too loose. Why not just have the engine forward and have the chain be tighter. That way, I don't have to learn how to put a chain back on, and I don't have to learn how to move the engine forward. Also, if everyone complains about the crappy packaging and visible scratches, why don't you come up with a fix for that? It's annoying. That being said, it's pretty cool. I'm just not very mechanically inclined.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good Fun Value
customer_reviews.text: Mini bike came fast, everything went togeather okay. You don't need to be a mechanical genius to finish assembly. Started up and runs good. It's pretty quick for only 3hp. Should be many years of fun. The box was pretty beat up and there was some scratches on the paint from shipping..This is a relatively easy and cheap way to get your kids into powersports or test interest.
customer_reviews.author: Jake McKay

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 old year old son and he LOVES it. He would ride it for 8 hours a day if he could. One thing to be careful of is the brake system. You have to make sure they are adjusted perfectly, I did not check these before he got on and he wore down the brake pads in one day. You can get a new set of pads for about six dollars and they are pretty easy to change out, or you can just buy a new caliper for twelve dollars, so either way its not a pricey fix. I think it goes about twenty mph, which is plenty for a kid under ten.
customer_reviews.author: Moses Locke

customer_reviews.title: it was missing parts,  nuts and washers! so how are you suppose to asseble it properly?
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed when we received it, before we even open it. It was shipped in the original box ONLY, so the box was damaged, which resulted in the bike being scratched up and then we had to try and find washers and nuts. When you buy something that has to be assembled, its pretty important to have all the pieces and parts included. We have not yet had a chance to ride the bike because we are trying to find the proper parts to finish putting it together. So needless to say, I am not very happy with this purchase and disappointed. It is a Christmas gift for our son. So buyer be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I really want to love this bike- perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this bike- perfect size, metal and paint are great- BUT the engine is junk. Smoked excessively on start up and never stopped. Coleman powersports never responded, so I returned it through Amazon. Did not exchange it because I have zero confidence in the engine manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Close to being great...
customer_reviews.text: If not for the continuous issue with the chain popping off, this would be a great product. I've done everything I can to tighten the chain, including buying/installing some aftermarket parts to help with this. This is a shame as it's a great little bike, but we're going to return it. The bike has probably been ridden a total of 10 times with 8 of those ending b/c the chain popped.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Metzner

customer_reviews.title: Broken items in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The bike is nice but tire will not hold pressure. Tire appears ok. I’ve checked for any punctures or sharp objects and nothing found. I think the rim isn’t sealed right or rim is defective. Also the plastic part for air filter was broken upon arrival. It appears to be shipping that may have caused this or possibly happened during packaging. It’s a shame because I really like the bike overall (was gonna but a 2nd for my daughter)but buying online is risky because they won’t let me return or do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: J. wynohradnyk

customer_reviews.title: Very POORLY Packaged for Shipping, Pieces Missing
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was very poorly done and the box had 6" tears in it and the bottom was nearly completely off so it was no surprise when we finished opening it and found some pieces missing and a considerable amount of scratched paint. Aside from this, we found it easy to put together (after a trip to our local hardware store!) and it started right up. It is larger than I expected but, not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Little Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Started right up. I am a big guy 6'4 240lbs and I was rolling around on it with my kids. still had plenty of power. Liked it so much we bought another one yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Radcliff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Grand kids
customer_reviews.text: Arrived via Fed Ex in good condition. Box was fully intact yet there were some small scrapes and chips in the paint like I had read in other reviews. They must have occured at the factory before being boxed. Very easy to assemble, only too about 15 minutes. Directions were very clear. After adding oil and gas it started on the 3rd pull. Kids and grand kids rode it all afternoon with no problems what so ever. It says it is recommended for up to 150 lbs and I would agree with that. Anyone heavier would be a strain on it. Overall it is exactly what I expected and would recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need the MSO if you want a Title contact colemanpowersportsusa.com
customer_reviews.text: To get an MSO so you can Title your bike you need to contact Coleman Power Sports USA not Amazon. The MSO is "not shipped with the bike when ordered through Amazon". Other than that not really for adults but an adult can absolutely ride this thing. It is well made and is as heavy as a full size Coleman Mini Bike as weighs about the same. So much heavier steel is used in this smaller bike. Will last a long time with proper care.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike
customer_reviews.text: Great little bike. My son uses it everyday to change sprinkler pipe on the farm. It is rough to ride in the fields. I was expecting it to be a bit smoother with the tires. Like the old three wheelers. The bearings in the rear wheel did not last through the summer but it is also covering a lot of miles every day getting from sprinkler pipe line to sprinkler pipe line. Starts up easy and easy to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of scratched paint down to metal.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 8 year son bday. Box came ok. Handle bar nut was found in box. Missing 1 washer for wheel axel luckily I had a replacement. Lots of scratched paint areas on it.. With all that said ....it runs great. Presentation 2 stsrs. 4 to five stars for running well. Before purchasing a mini bike or go kart you should learn how to use a wrench. These things don't come repair proof. Will always need to be looked over..it's a hobbie not a one time purchase and wine and moan the chain popped.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Only used it for 1 hour. Since that first time using it, it will not start no matter what I do. Wanted to use the "provided" spark plug wrench to check the plug (even though it is brand new) but they forgot to include it. Worthless mini bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it’s any easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Only had a chance to start it up, but had zero issues with the shipping, and unit it’s self. I read some of the reviews knocking the unit and shipping. First, shipping damages can happen (our sprocket and front fender was damaged), we hammered out the fender, but for the price, and the fact my boys will be in the dirt with the motorcycle, it’s going to get scratched. My only fear was the performance, that will be soon tested at our ranch, but it’s any easy to assemble, easy to start mini motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Whispering Barrels

customer_reviews.title: 5 mns. of fun *update
customer_reviews.text: The bike didn't make it around the house and the chain came off, taking longer to fix it than the first ride lasted. Hope it it's better may send back. Sad the day after Christmas, too. It was fun for about 5 mins. sorry. Called the support number for Coleman. They were very helpful and fixed the trouble. Bike is working fine plus a whole day of riding! Yeah wonderful gift! Now the chain won't stay on the bike. Ride for a while the chain pops off. We use tight lock ok for a while. then off again. Work on it more than riding it. Great Bike if it worked right.
customer_reviews.author: karen lee dillon

customer_reviews.title: Buy some loctite 243!
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought each of the 3 kids one of these mini bikes this year. They are great and tons of fun but ONLY when the chain sprockets are properly aligned and the bolt that holds the clutch on has some Loctite 243 applied. Chains came off many times. Clutch bolts backed out on all three min-bikes within the first 30 minutes of riding. Proper alignment, tightened chain, and clutch bolt tightened with loctite and perfect. Wish Santa would have had this info up front! Happy kids so all is well.
customer_reviews.author: grant thompson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know it was previously owned
customer_reviews.text: Bike was used. Previous owner wrecked it. Oil was left in compartment and leaked out everywhere. Had the bike repaired bc it was a present for one of my sons. Expensive lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: seems ok
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine from fed ex. Seriously, Do something about the packaging. Bottom was nearly falling out. I've read the reviews about the packaging and they're not kidding. I signed for it anyway. Received all the parts and just a couple paint scuffs so far. Looks really nice so far. I'll fire it up tonight too see if it runs. Already ordered a torque converter. Bummer didn't come with racks.
customer_reviews.author: Tacocat

customer_reviews.title: My son's bike
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting over a week And this is how I get the bike in brakes broke in oil in the in the tank gas in the tank not even the original Box parts missing if you order this bike from here don't use UPS
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two. Both were perfect on delivery, though I was worried because the packaging want that great. The boxes we pretty banged up. Assembly was easy. We were riding in no time. These were for my 10 year-old daughter and 11 year old son. The minibike is just a little big for my daughter, but she does ok. Overall, I'm really happy! Oh, and I've ridden them myself. I'm 225 lbs. They scoot me around without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Palermoc

customer_reviews.title: A good bike for the money .
customer_reviews.text: When I received the bike the box was heavily damaged on the bottom . The rear wheel was hanging out the bottom and the box was dumped standing on its side . The bike inside had scratches on the handlebar and rear frame but nothing major . I got everything I needed to have to assemble the bike including the tool kit and manuals . Overall the bike is in good shape . I am 5' 8" and 175 Lbs .
customer_reviews.author: Parker J.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: The only issue that I had was that the clutch screeched the first time it was used. After oiling clutch it's still screeched. I called Coleman and they happily sent me a new clutch, it seems to be a common issue with the ct200. All in all, a pretty good product with pretty good customer service
customer_reviews.author: John Mocks

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the boxes look like they did all their own stunts . Once I opened it up to assemble the bike parts were kinda touching other parts causing scratches on forks and frame. Minor cosmetic flaws. First big ouch was a broken brake lever that was dangling from mount. Other than that it’s a piece of cake to assemble and it fired up with ease. It was a blast up and down the street few times. I parked it because it had a bad broken lever.
customer_reviews.author: Rabon Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bike.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little bikes when they leave the shipper I'm sure. I bought 2 of these and both of them looked like they were drug behind the UPS truck. Both had significant damage as well as cosmetic damage. Both brake levers were broke off, one had bent handle bars and the tabs that hold the chain cover on were severely bent. One had the front axle bolt and nut laying next to the box on the front porch. Good thing the UPS driver must have saw them fall out and kept track of them. (Kudos to him) other than horrible packaging these are really good bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mini bike!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing. I haven't had so much fun in years. I was expecting it to show up damaged but the box was in perfect condition and the delivery driver was very nice as well. I'm almost 6 foot and weigh about 150 pounds and even with the speed governor still installed, this thing is an absolute blast and pulls me around no problem at all. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Donnelly Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great bikes. Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love the bikes. However they came with no paperwork. I want to get ORV permits but without the paperwork I can't. So they sit in my garage. Kids are NOT happy! I've contacted customer service and they opened a ticket but it's been weeks without a peep. Tried contacting them again and I get a message saying their email is full.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Best Mini Bike for the PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bike for the price. I love how there’s a wide market of upgrades for it of all kinds to turn the 20 mph toy into a beast of your liking. I fully tricked mine out and still not done yet. Pushing 72.4 mph with a few upgrades to the stock motor.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo Harris

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect - CT200U-AB
customer_reviews.text: Runs well and was easy to assemble. I saw other reviews say it came damaged, but coleman seems to have listened and now adds more shipping foam and protection! Although one problem is the brake lever as shown above was broken from shipping, so that sucks. Otherwise this minibike is great!
customer_reviews.author: Minda

customer_reviews.title: Upon recieving the CT100U Gas powered bike
customer_reviews.text: It arrived right on time. It was very easy to assemble. I let my 9-year-old son do it. However there we some dents in the front fender, and paint scratched off all around the bike. Very small issue. So in the above picture, you will see that I had to take off the derby cover so I could unhinge the two metal bars that need to help engage when you are trying to pull start the bike. We are very pleased with the bike so far, it runs like a champ. Perfect if you are teaching your son/daughter how to ride, it has no suspension so when you upgrade it will be a smooth process.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love my little metal pony
customer_reviews.text: I am 52 and wanted one of these as a kid. Got it at great price on a lightning deal. Arrived in good shape a few scratches here & there no biggie. Was able to watch a video found online and put it together mostly by myself..had the hubs double check everything . Just F.Y.I I an 5'4" 150 lbs and it's got plenty of power and I don't feel to big for it at all. Ride on!
customer_reviews.author: lauraW

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, waiting on parts delivery now
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was way quicker than originally thought. I would buy again from this seller. The mini bike was missing some parts. I called Coleman customer service and I’m waiting on the parts now. Otherwise I’m really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: william hurst

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old nephew loves his new mini bike! Just a caution, it is a little faster than I thought it would be. I had my neighbor help to put it together as he knows motorcycles/dirt bikes. There was some damage to the box upon arrival but it had no effect on the product. It seems to be sturdy and it's easy to start. Started on first pull!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K

customer_reviews.title: My son and I both approve!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little motorcycle. I got the ct100u as a gift for my 9 year old and he absolutely loved it. We both had such a blast with it that I ended up ordering the ct200u for myself. Thanks to this Coleman mini bike my son and I are having lots of fun together.
customer_reviews.author: Macho Man Jay Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old and he loves it! Followed the assembly instructions, added oil and gas and it started right up! Only runs with the choke on so it may need some adjustment. Runs great and the whole family is enjoying riding it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this mini bike at the price we paid!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The box that it came in was soaked in bike oil. The bike was covered in bike oil. A metal packing brace was twisted, and the paint looked like it was dropped and the paint was scratched a lot in several places. The notes on the bike read that the bike DID NOT ship with oil in it. Where did all the oil come from???? Some of the washers were missing. Had to go to the hardware store and purchase what we needed to put the front wheel on, WHY??? VERY UPSET with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Grasshopper

customer_reviews.title: Runs faster if you adjust the govenor with a screwdriver lol.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these to run around on the property. One worked fine. The other one had a hole at the bottom of the fuel tank. So unless you are mechanic who knows how to weld be aware.
customer_reviews.author: 2Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Daily rider
customer_reviews.text: He has been riding it daily and is learning how to fix his chain. He loves going over ramps. 8.5 year old boy. On delivery did have the chain guard dented in and we had to bang it out. Thicker metal on the chain guard would be helpful because it still rattled because we couldn’t reduce the entire dent. Great bike to lead into dirt bike. No gears
customer_reviews.author: Jen Beard

customer_reviews.title: Freaking Awesome motorcycle. Not exactly small or mini at all
customer_reviews.text: Freaking Awesome motorcycle. Not exactly small or mini at all. There is a new version called CT200u-EX too for 2017....
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN MCCANN

customer_reviews.title: Great 13 year old birthday present and introduction into 2 wheel motor sports
customer_reviews.text: Just a little awkward for 1 person on assemble so a 2 set of hand to hole is very helpful, and a little gas and oil and it started up on the 2nd pull and easy to restart, a very big plus seeing I got it for my 13 year old son
customer_reviews.author: Jason e.

customer_reviews.title: Runs great
customer_reviews.text: Fast and so much fun! The shipping was terrible, my box was demolished by the time it made it's way to me, which caused extensive cosmetic damage to the frame and other parts of the bike, it runs great just I just wish there were so many scratches and dents. All around it's a good bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ashly & Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Really cool for the price, lots of power!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power! Purchased for my 7 year old, but the grown men around here have much more fun with it! Not for youngins, we should've followed the guidance for 13 and up. My little guy is excited to grow into it!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimy Zorotovic

customer_reviews.title: Missing lock nut for front axle
customer_reviews.text: Package showed up just like all the other reviews state. Box was destroyed and really surprised more wasnt missing. But one important piece was missing, the lock nut for the front wheel. I thought ok, not to big of a deal but after going to 5 hardware stores and it is not carried because of the fine thread. Next i will try to replace the whole piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: Runs great..
customer_reviews.text: I put the front tire on plus finder. All the tools need where in the box.. Took me prob 20 min.. little gas.. Grandkids Love it.. Disk breaks too.. NICE..!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly and frustrating chain problems.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. I discovered on one after chain kept coming off that a bearing was missing on one side of chain tensioner. This has been very frustrating. Also both bikes have acres for adjusting the governed which are unable to be adjusted. They are seized and cannot be loosed even with a vice grip.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Total fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great little minibike, starts and runs very well. I would give it 5 stars but you definitely need to lube the bearings, use threadlocker on the bolts you put together, and put threadlocker on the sprocket bolts. Spend about 10 minutes doing those things and you have a great little minibike!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I have had so much fun with this. I am 6'3" 340lb man and this thing moves me with no problems. That was even when it was stock. It is not stock anymore. one of the great things is there are parts available to do all kinds of stuff to this awesome thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jerm

customer_reviews.title: JUNK,JUNK,JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Purchase it for my grandson took him out Christmas Morning , started the it and it ran about 2 minute then cut off and will not start back up. Had it checked out and it has no compression in motor. Amazon why you let these people sell on here ? They want even talk to me about a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Ray Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: What do I dislike??? I dislike the fact that I paid $400 for this thing and it doesn't work out of the box. I dislike the fact that it was covered in oil when I opened the box. I dislike the fact that I have to make phone calls and jump thru hoops to get this taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: rich caito

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing! It has adjustable throttle so if your not a confident rider you can start out slow and adjust up with only a screwdriver. I weigh 360 lbs and it can haul my fat butt around with out issues.
customer_reviews.author: cameron goldsworth

customer_reviews.title: Runs good
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old loves it. Well made, tires are cool (pretty good size). Easy to assemble. Good power and pep.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny_4321

customer_reviews.title: Great ride
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to assemble. After shipping it arrived within two days! Very happy about the purchase. Love riding and the feel of the bike is not “mini” just right❤️
customer_reviews.author: New Mommy03

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Went together very easily. Maybe 20-30 minutes and it was fired up and ready to go. I'm over 200lbs and it moved me easily. My daughter is loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: best $500 you could ever spend during a pandemic
customer_reviews.text: I received my order very quickly. Opened it and assembled it. I like it a lot! I am 200lbs and the bike moves me effortlessly. Getting up the driveway is a bit of a struggle but its really no problem. In all, I will say it needs to go a bit faster but not any time soon. I like it a lot and I recommend this product to anyone! Also, I live in California so to any California residents out there you're good to ride
customer_reviews.author: Matt Omary

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Lets start with i do not write reviews. Now this was the best money inhave spent in a long time....i got my mini bike delivered today and my 7 year old boy Absolutely loves it! Perfect size and they turned our mini bike into a 2020 version. Time will tell how it holds up but could not be happier so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Reis

customer_reviews.title: Need a fix for handle bar
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Bout to take for a spin. Throttle has separated as shown in photo. Would like a fix for that. Customer service please contact.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrad C.

customer_reviews.title: Good but to much money
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to tighten the chain a lot and the screw holding the brake lever fell off had to put a new one on thank God I had one that fit good but other then that I've been writing it really hard for the past 2 weeks on its holding up good other wise
customer_reviews.author: noah h.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on ordering a large item with a limited return policy. Of course, item showed up scratched (which I was willing to live with) but during assembly it's missing 2 washers, the main locking not for steering column and the steering column bolt was stripped. Great Christmas present for my 13 year old. Way to disappoint...
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: careful missing nut
customer_reviews.text: we have not used much yet but just want put this out. ours was missing front wheel lock nut, says 12mm in paperwork. its realy 12mm extra fine tapered thread,
customer_reviews.author: Edie R.

customer_reviews.title: CT200U Great Mini Bike
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is a blast around the yard and trails. I looked at a bunch of reviews before purchasing it and yes the racks do come with it although they are not in the initial picture on Amazon. You have to buy two of them though. One isn't enough when friends are over.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our boys for Christmas. When putting in together Christmas Eve we discovered that the 2 front washers and bolts that hold on the tire were missing (and no we didn’t misplace them). Looked gorgeous by the tree too bad we couldn’t take it out for a ride. Way to make Santa look bad!!! Majorly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Koch

customer_reviews.title: Constantly stalls
customer_reviews.text: Stalls constantly, I have this and the standard red one. The red one is great, this one stalls constantly, took it to a mechanic and they can't figure it out. Stick with the red one.
customer_reviews.author: Lakebeard&LadyRedbush

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Got the mini bike to ride around the property. Easy to use. Has just enough power to let the grand kids ride it. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zignon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mini-bike for beginner
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact the coleman ctu-a 200 is fully automatic (no shifting) the bike is well built and is easy to ride looks cool is fairly quiet, has power to move husky adults 20mph overall is a great value ,i love it its so much fun perfect beginner mini-bike
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old school style
customer_reviews.text: Its really hard to describe, its smaller than regular old school mini bikes, and slower but can be modified easily, clean and well built little bike for beginners,
customer_reviews.author: Outlaw1

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We got this in August last year. This thing has taken a beating from our grandchildren. Still running strong. Fifth few weeks it was on the ground alot. This is a strong mini bike.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible ......my son rode it 5 times after a Certified auto mechanic put it together and the chain continues to fall off..... good luck trying to call Powersports manufacturer of Coleman..... never call you back!!!!! Total Bankers hours too..... never available!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with the Coleman brand. Easy assembly. Runs great. Overall a super fun little bike.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah kasmarek

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little bike. We’re using it as a transition from a 50 cc to something bigger and it has good pick up and go! My daughters love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra L. Crull

customer_reviews.title: i like this machine!  the throttle limit screw was welded!  no busterooni!  But the tab where the throttle hits the fan--bendy!
customer_reviews.text: i plan to pick up a decent boat seat for this, then a little less spinal cord damage, also can anyone help me to find out what is hissing when the throttle is engaged? i'll check the spark plug next. already had to fix the chain tentioner which was really loose-- added a couple washers
customer_reviews.author: at 38 degrees

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality is what you are looking for. Lots of fun both my bud and i got one, easily supporting closer to 270lbs with ease. The hardware is extremely lacking. Cheap steel bolts etc, came off during a slight bumpy ride even after safety look over before hand. Otherwise a fun buy
customer_reviews.author: Preston Naglieri

customer_reviews.title: Beat to pieces
customer_reviews.text: Box had a big hole in it front forks were bent and paint is scraped off. I put it together and put gas in it for my son and the gas tank leaks out the bottom so he cam not ride it. Very disappointed, I have the 200 model it is awsom . I believe the damage is from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: david nichols

product_meta.title: Coleman Powersports Mini Bike Trail Scooter for Adults & Kids 13+, Gas Powered, 98cc/3.0HP, Black (CT100U-B)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:98cc/3.0HPThe Coleman Trail100U (CT100) reinvents the classic mini bike design with modern materials and craftsmanship. The reliable 3Hp OHV engine will power you through the trails All day with plenty of Muscle while being gas efficient. The robust steel frame will withstand years of use and the rear disc brake allows for reliable stopping.
feature_bullets: POWERFUL & EFFICIENT: The 4 stroke OHV 1 cylinder engine with 98cc/3. 0HP, will power you through the trails all day with plenty of muscle while still being fuel efficient.
EASY & SMOOTH: The easy pull start operation makes this the ideal trail bike for any rider. Low-pressure tires provide a soft, smooth ride even on rugged terrain.

DURABLE & RELIABLE: Built with a rugged, proven clutch and a solid, sturdy metal frame this heavy-duty mini bike will withstand years of fun on the trail. The rear drum break allows for reliable stopping.
FUN FOR ALL: With a load capacity of 150 pounds and clearance of 5. 5 inches, this scooter is perfect for everyone 13+.

specifications.Model: Mini Bike TrailScooter for Adults & Kids 13+, Gas Powered, 98cc/3.0HP, Black
specifications.Cover Included: Mini bike, tool kit for assembly
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars785 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
